website_summaries.verdict: The majority of the consumers have found themselves happy and contented with their purchase of the Puma Hybrid NX. The shoe received a lot of praise because of its design and excellent construction. Although one of the buyers has issues with its narrow width, others were appreciative of how the shoe performed in different types of activities. With many praises about the shoe’s comfort level and cushioning, there is no doubt that they recommend the Hybrid NX to their peers because of its quality and performance.
pros: Some of the consumers say that the Puma Hybrid NX is comfortable
Based on reviews, the shoe is stable
According to those who have tested it, the footwear is best used for cross-training, short runs, and gym activities
The shoe is well-cushioned, several testers commented
It is true to size, noted by a few consumers
The majority of the buyers love its stylish look
cons: One of the buyers said that the shoe has a narrow width
As a result, it feels too tight during the running session

customer_reviews.title: Puma hybrid nxt black & yellow 7/10
customer_reviews.text: Hybrid NXT -> is a great version of the puma hybrid line NRGY beads encompasses the heel while soft foam and woven body is the rest . Not as comfy as the desert runner or rocket runner , but a good shoe nonetheless. Toe bead narrower than normal. I always get 11.5 but these should have been 12’s . Puma and the hybrid sole have a top notch shoe -> smallish in toe bed - I would get a 12 when I normally get an 11.5 .

product_meta.title: PUMA Men's Hybrid Nx Sneaker
product_meta.description: The all-new hybrid ozone is a game-changing cushioned running shoe. The ozone features hybrid, a mix of puma's two most innovative midsole foam, ignite & nrgy. Hybrid provides the perfect combination of cushioning, comfort, and responsiveness. Exceptional heel & Toe grip are complimented by midfoot pro foam for a lightweight, smooth transition. The midfoot wrap-up and lacing system are ideal for running or any active workouts. The hybrid ozone fuses street style with technology? For the 24/7 Sport performer.?.
